Posts.Content: Apr 5, 2009 09:17AM Blondee wrote: Hello all. I was diagnosed with bc at age 43 which means my dauughter who is now 19 should start getting mammo's at age 33. She had her first gyn appointment at age 18 which gives me some peace of mind because she is getting breast exams from early on. All we can do is be vigilant in terms of our daughters and their breast health. Its very scary but I pray that soon medical science will find a cure for this horrible desease.
Posts.Title: What's in store for our young daughters? pinkshortcake Carolina59
